aboutMeComponent.aboutMe: Hi, I'm a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Mönchengladbach. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutMeComponent.basedIn: I am very flexible when it comes to work environments and can work effectively both in the Mönchengladbach area and remotely
aboutMeComponent.challenges:
I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to
          constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
aboutMeComponent.description: In my profession, programming isn't merely about writing code; it is a creative approach to problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into straightforward, user-friendly solutions. In doing so, I help you achieve your goals and bring your vision to life.
aboutMeComponent.title: About me

contactMe.description: Are you looking for a dedicated and skilled professional to take your project to the next level? Please feel free to get in touch! Let me know which role is pivotal for your project – whether in software development or another exciting area. With my passion for innovative solutions and my expertise, I am confident that I can make a significant contribution to your project's success.
contactMe.privacyPolicy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined

warning.message: What do you need to develop?
warning.name: Oops! it seems your name is missing

contactMe.yourMessagePlaceholder: Hello Daniel, I am interested in...

popUpWindow.description01: A task manager inspired by the Kanban system: create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functionality, assign users, and categorize tasks.
popUpWindow.description02: Take control of Sharkie, the fearless fish, and battle your way through the depths of the ocean! Collect coins and use bottles to execute powerful attacks. Defeat smaller fish and face an increasingly challenging final boss in each level.
popUpWindow.description03: This application, inspired by Slack, provides an intuitive solution for enhancing internal communication. With real-time messaging and a well-organized channel structure, team interaction is significantly simplified.

projects.description: Explore a selection of my work  here - interact with projects to see my skills in action.

skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to further expanding my knowledge.
skills.description: I have gained extensive experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular, enabling me to create modern, responsive web applications. My broad skill set in front-end development empowers me to deliver creative solutions while adapting flexibly to the ever-evolving demands of the web. I place great importance on continuous learning and quickly embracing new technologies to stay ahead in this rapidly changing industry.

whatPeopleSayAboutMe.0: Daniel has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the succcess of our project.
whatPeopleSayAboutMe.1: Daniel's analytical approach and innovative ideas drive our projects forward. His technical expertise and readiness to share knowledge make him an invaluable team member.
whatPeopleSayAboutMe.2: Daniel is reliable and communicates effectively. His structured approach under pressure ensures smooth and productive teamwork.
whatPeopleSayAboutMe.title:
What my colleagues say about
    me

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: We have drawn up this privacy policy (version 17.03.2025-312965916) in order to provide you with information in accordance with the requirements of the
privacyPolicy.introductionText3: and applicable national laws to explain which personal data (in short data (data for short) we process as the controller – and the processors processors commissioned by us (e.g. providers) – will process in the future will process in the future and what lawful options you have. The terms used are to be understood as gender-neutral.
privacyPolicy.shortInformation: We provide you with comprehensive information about the data we process about you.
privacyPolicy.longInformation: Data protection declarations usually sound very technical and use legal terms. This privacy policy, on the other hand, is intended to the most important things as simply and transparently as possible. As far as is conducive to transparency, technical terms are explained in a terms are explained in a reader-friendly way, links to further information are provided and graphics are used. We thus provide information in clear and simple language that we only process personal data as part of our business activities only process personal data if there is a corresponding legal basis. This is certainly not possible if you use terse, unclear and legal-technical explanations, as is often standard on the standard on the Internet when it comes to data protection. I hope you find the following explanations interesting and informative and perhaps some information that you did not yet know.
privacyPolicy.longInformation2: If you still have any questions, please contact the responsible office or body named below or in the legal notice, follow the provided links for further information on third-party websites, or find our contact details in the legal notice.
privacyPolicy.areaOfApplicationText: This privacy policy applies to all personal data processed by our company, including data processed by commissioned processors, and refers to information as defined in Art. 4 No. 1 GDPR, such as a person's name, email address, and postal address, ensuring that we can offer and bill our services and products both online and offline.
privacyPolicy.list1: all online presences (websites, online stores) that we operate
privacyPolicy.list2: Social media presence and e-mail communication
privacyPolicy.list3: Mobile apps for smartphones and other devices
privacyPolicy.strongTextList: The Privacy Policy applies to all areas where personal data is processed in a structured manner within the company via the mentioned channels; if we establish legal relationships with you outside these channels, we will inform you separately if necessary.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText1: In the following privacy policy, we provide transparent information on the legal principles and regulations of the General Data Protection Regulation that allow us to process personal data.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText2: As far as EU law is concerned, we refer to REGULATION (EU) 2016/679 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of April 27, 2016, which can be accessed online via EUR-Lex, the official portal for EU law.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText4: We will only process your data if at least one of the following conditions applies.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText6: (Article 6 paragraph 1 lit. a GDPR): You have given us your consent to process data for a specific purpose, such as storing the data you entered in a contact form.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText8: (Article 6(1)(b) GDPR): We process your data to fulfill a contract or pre-contractual obligations with you, such as when concluding a purchase contract that requires your personal information in advance.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText10: (Article 6(1)(c) GDPR): We process your data if we are subject to a legal obligation, such as the legal requirement to retain invoices for accounting purposes, which usually contain personal data.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText12: (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR): We process personal data if we have a legitimate interest that does not restrict your fundamental rights, such as ensuring the secure and efficient operation of our website.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText13: Other conditions, such as processing in the public interest, the exercise of official authority, or the protection of vital interests, generally do not apply to us; however, if such a legal basis becomes relevant, we will indicate it accordingly.
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText14: In addition to the EU regulation, national laws also apply:
privacyPolicy.legalBasicText16: This is the Federal Act on the Protection of Individuals with regard to the Processing of Personal Data (Data Protection Act), in short.
privacyPolicy.legalBasicText17: In Germany, the Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG) applies.
privacyPolicy.legalBasicText18: If other regional or national laws apply, we will inform you in the following sections.
